channel.title: MORE on MORE - Modular Open Research Platform
channel.description: Recent content in MORE on MORE - Modular Open Research Platform

item.title: Impressum
item.description:
IMPRINT

MORE: Modular Open Research Platform for Digital Health

Rechtlich unselbstständige Einrichtung der Ludwig Boltzmann Gesellschaft

Lindhofstr. 22

5020 Salzburg

Österreich

Tel: +43 (0) 5 7255 82701

Email: more@dhp.lbg.ac.at

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description:
Privacy policy for the MORE app

Ludwig Boltzmann Gesellschaft - Österreichische Vereinigung zur F örderung der wissenschaftlichen Forschung (registered in Nu ßdorfer Stra ße 64, 6. Stock, 1090 Wien, Österreich), represented by Ludwig Boltzmann Institute for Digital Health and Prevention (located at Lindhofstra ße 22, 5020 Salzburg, Austria, Tel +43 (0) 57255 82701; hereinafter “LBI-DHP ”) acts as the data controller of your personal data and takes your privacy and the protection of your personal data seriously.

item.title: About MORE
Next Steps
item.description:
MORE Developments

NEXT STEPS FOR THE PLATFORM

The research space is ever-evolving, so is MORE. This means that we are constantly working on ways to enhance the types of research and studies that can be implemented with MORE. Some things we are working on:
